script.title: logout.slax
script.author: jpanagos
script.synopsis: This event script mimicks Cisco's absolute vty timeout functionality.
script.description: This script works on 9.2. It uses jade_auth_success as the generated event to cause the script to be run every 60 seconds, this can be changed to fit your environment.

example.title: Config
example.description: The event-options to trigger this script are below:
